root.title: “Gurvalzhyn uul” mountain inscriptions, The
root.place: The inscription is carved on a rock in district “Gurvalzhyn uul” of Gurvan bulak sum of Bulgan aimag of Mongolia.
root.general: Қазiргi Моңғолияның Бұлғын аймағы, Гурван бұлақ сұмыны “Гурвалжин уул” (Үшкiл тауы) деген жердегi жартаста қашалған.
root.description: There are 1 line of the inscription and 2 signs.
root.investigation: O.Namnandorzh 427 and B.Rintchen 428 published the first report in 1968. The Kazakh scientist B.Bazylhan 426 made translation and explanations in 1969 on the basis of the report. S.G.Klyashtornyi 429 gave another version of perusal of the inscription in 1975.
